frameDefinitions: Unless a particular Required_situation obtains, Negative_consequences will follow.
A Cognizer makes a Decision, which may be about an entity or a course of action.
This frame is concerned with the likelihood of a Hypothetical_event occurring.
A particular Situation is likely (or unlikely) to result in a harmful event befalling an Asset.
An Exerter, Action, or Force is capable of exerting or does exert a physical force at a level specified by the target.
A Cognizer decides upon the Chosen (either an item or a course of action) out of a set of  Possibilities .
frameExamples: You <t>must</t> turn in your test by 5 p.m.
It is <t>likely</t> that he'll arrive late.
Eugenie loved the sea and was a <t>strong</t> swimmer.
The council <t>picked</t> you out of all the pilots available to head this mission.
listRoleDefinitions: The state-of-affairs which prevents <fen>Negative_consequences</fen>.
The period during which the <fen>Required_situation</fen> is necessary to prevent negative consequences.
The location within which the <fen>Required_situation</fen> is required.
The <fen>Cognizer</fen> decides on a course of action.
<fen>Decision</fen> identifies the entity or course of action upon which the <fen>Cognizer</fen> decides.
The time or time period over which the <fen>Cognizer</fen> makes the decision.
The place where the <fen>Cognizer</fen> makes the decision.
The state of affairs or occurrence whose likelihood is assessed.
When the event occurs.
Where the event takes place.
The <fen>Situation</fen> which may lead to a harmful event.
Something judged to be desirable or valuable which might be lost or damaged.
A concrete or abstract entity which may come to cause the loss of, or damage to the Asset.
The time period during which the <fen>Situation</fen> has the specified level of safety.
A particular location for which the <fen>Situation</fen> is safe. Frequently, it is to be inferred that the characteristics of the location make various <fen>Situation</fen>s safe or unsafe.
The <fen>Exerter</fen> that can or does exert a force of the level specified by the target.
The <fen>Force</fen> that can or does exert a force of the level specified by the target.
The <fen>Action</fen> that can or does exert a force of the level specified by the target.
The <fen>Time</fen> during which the <fen>Exerter</fen>, <fen>Action</fen>, or <fen>Force</fen> can or does exert its force.
The location where the <fen>Exerter</fen>, <fen>Action</fen>, or <fen>Force</fen> can or does exert its force.
The <fen>Cognizer</fen> chooses the <fen>Chosen</fen> out of the <fen>Possibilities</fen>.
<fen>Chosen</fen> identifies the entity or course of action which is selected from among the <fen>Possibilities</fen>.

A <fen>Cognizer</fen> makes a choice from among a set of <fen>Possibilities</fen>. <fen>Possibilities</fen> are commonly expressed via an oblique phrase which indicates the alternative or alternatives, or by a subordinate clause (choosing to do it or choosing not to do it), typically headed by 'whether or 'if'.
This role identifies the <fen>Time</fen> when the <fen>Cognizer</fen> chooses the <fen>Chosen</fen>.
This role identifies the <fen>Place</fen> where the choosing occurs.
listRoleExamples: He was told that <fex>when he got back</fex> , his column needed a serious rethink .
<fex>In California</fex> , seatbelts must be fastened at all times .
<fex>Mo</fex> decided to quit the program.
Mo decided <fex>to quit the program</fex>.
The State Cabinet <fex>today</fex> decided to file an appeal in the Supreme Court seeking an extension of six months for implementation of its judgment
<fex>At the first</fex> crossroad we decided to wait.
<fex>Rain</fex> is fairly unlikely today, I think.
There is a high chance of rain <fex>today</fex>.
There is a high chance of rain <fex>in Seattle</fex>.
Most people agree, <fex>going over 100mph</fex> is unsafe.
Honey is not safe <fex>for babies</fex>.
<fex>That man</fex> is a risk!
Salesmen touted the power <fex>of the engine's motor</fex>.
No one should underestimate the mighty <fex>strength</fex> of the dung beetle.
She gave him a playful, weak <fex>punch</fex> in the arm.
My quads feel particularly weak <fex>after 100 squats</fex>.
Muhammad Ali's force <fex>in the ring</fex> was indisputable.
<fex>We</fex>have to pick a colour for the living room.
I decided <fex>to give it another try</fex>.
They chose their new guitarist <fex>out of more than 300 auditioners</fex>.
I was n't chosen <fex>in the last round</fex>.
The winner was selected <fex>in the secret meeting room</fex>.

sourceCandidateSpans.text: COOL WORLD IS A DISAPPOINTING DESTINATION"
THERE'S NOT MUCH HAPPENING IN COOL WORLD"
